'''Radiant Spincrystal 39''' is an item used in the [[Furnishings]] [[Euphonium Unbound: Winding]] or [[Euphonium Unbound: Soaring]] to unlock the [[Soundtrack]] [[The Fading Stories (Qingce Night)|The Fading Stories]] in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

It is located off of the town center of [[Qingce Village]], hiding behind some barrels.
